name: All Settings
author: Seth Lilly

sections.description: Simple plugin that adds an All Settings submenu to the Settings menu for Administrators and above, enabling one-click access to the options.php file.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all-settings.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What exactly does this do?

This plugin adds an All Settings submenu to the Settings menu, providing one-click access for Administrators and above to the WordPress options.php file. This file allows editing of some of the values in the wp-options table.

short_description: Simple plugin that adds an All Settings submenu to the Settings menu for Administrators and above, enabling one-click access to the options.php file.
description: Simple plugin that adds an All Settings submenu to the Settings menu for Administrators and above, enabling one-click access to the options.php file.
